phrases: Send the lost promises to the stars
My memories will not fade away
yotsuba no clover sagashinagara kimi no kao
I steal a glance at you as we look for four-leaf clovers,
chirari nusumi mite wa me o sorasu
yasashii ame wa furu watashitachi no ue ni
The gentle rain falls above our heads
surechigau hito no kazu dake dramatic ni naru no
as it becomes as dramatic as the number of people passing by
I wonder if we will ever be able to
itsuka mata aeru hi ga kurukashira
reunite with those precious things that were broken
The scars that were left behind will not go away
What are you doing for New Year's?
Why do not you come back home?
I did not go back home, using work and homework as an excuse.
So it is an hour to go.
A strange sense of distance always proves to be an obstacle on my way home.
You should stop by more often.
Have you gotten used to living by yourself yet?
YOU-Um, have you seen my mother?
Well, she collapsed last night because she was overworked.
She pushed herself since it is the end of the year and we lack staff.
Kazu-san should be nursing her back at home right now.
Do not tell me you have not been coming home because you do not like Kazu-san.
Have you talked to him about it?
Kazu-san's a pretty nice guy, you know.
He may have a loud voice and his feet may be a bit smelly...
But he is nice on the inside.
You should go talk to him about it!
N-No, it is not that I do not like him...
I was just really busy with work and homework.
You have not been back for half a year already!
It feels like I just lost half of my HP.
My father passed away from an illness when I was still in elementary school.
And he had a gentle smile.
On his last day, in the hospital...
With his large yet slender hands, he grasped mine with unbelievable strength.
Please take care of your mother for me.
I could never forget the warmth and strength that passed through his hands.
We have to be happy together.
I have to study hard and find a job close to home, so I can buy a house where we will live together one day.
But around the end of my second year of high school...
The man my mother brought with her was the complete opposite of my father.
And when I shook his calloused hand, I absentmindedly thought,
Ah, so Mom picked a strong person this time.
You do not have to only worry about me anymore.
You can start thinking about yourself now.
Hearing that, for the first time in my life, I realized that I was empty inside.
Up until that point, I was blindfolding myself to many things because I had to take care of my mother.
But now that I was suddenly free to do whatever I wanted...
I had to face the fact that I could not really do anything.
I did not know a single thing that I was good at...
Relying on that alone, I left home.
The factory is still the same.
My mother did not like that zinc factory because she thought it polluted the river...
But my father and I liked to watch it light up all over the mountain in the evening.
You were waving your hands like this just now.
Well, you seemed to be taking your time, and we could not reach you by phone...
It really has been a while, has not it?
Say, want to go somewhere with me for a bit?
I have not been to the batting center for years.
He is a little too into it...
Do not tell me that you have not been coming home because you do not like Kazu-san.
She was right on the dot.
I am going to go for the home run prize!
I am a little uncomfortable with him.
I will hit it straight ahead this time.
I am really uncomfortable with him.
So, why have not you been coming back?
Is it because I am here?
I also do not like this side of him.
Mitsu-san will be lonely if you do not come home.
And when she is lonely, I am sad too.
No one can replace someone else.
At first, I tried to make Mitsu-san happy in the stead of her late husband.
But that did not turn out too well.
I just could not replace Yuuichi-san in her life.
I learned the hard way that you cannot just replace family members.
I also want you to do what you can from your position.
I always choose my words carefully and often just keep quiet.
But no matter how clumsy or uncool this person is with his words...
He is been able to get his feelings across with driving effort...
So what I am saying is...
That is the first time I have seen one.
Wh-What the hell is this music?
I just hit a home run, you know!
Her bedside was accompanied by various little items that Kazu-san had lined up for her.
That was probably what Kazu-san meant by I will work hard and stay by her side.
I finally get to see your face.
She did not say anything more and just kept holding on to my hand.
Please take care of your mother for me.
W-Well then, I will come again.
I am uncomfortable with him just a little bit.
Do not forget to eat your greens!
He is always so straightforward and honest with his words, and a little rude.
But kind at the same time.
I will keep cheering for ya!
And so bright that I do not think I am a match for him.
I guess everyone is still at their homes.
Come to the Hanamoto's right now!!
Look, it is a super huge nozawana!
We have been waiting for you.
Otoshidama: monetary gift that Japanese children get from relatives on New Year's Day.
It is good to be back.
Why do not we just open everything?
Hey, please start with this one.
Hey, do not eat too much...
Chibi-Moni wants to go to the restroom!
I bet you just want to go yourself.
Why did it turn out like this?
The tickets that Morita-san brought for the Christmas gift exchange...
And there was only 1,000 yen worth of tickets...
I suppose it is as expected of Morita-san.
He is fiendishly lucky when it comes to money.
If you do not, I will be seeing you in court!
You are going to hire a lawyer for only 300,000 yen?!
Then let us all go on a trip!
And so I ended up having to pay for all six of us to go.
On top of that, am I just here as the driver?
What is more, the 300,000 got used up all at once.
But I guess it is all right.
Hagu seems to be having fun, after all.
Hey, guys, do not open packs of snacks one after another!
And you should not leave crumbs everywhere.
So there is a normal person in this group.
Sensei will have to clean up this rental car before we return it!
Why cannot we all clean up?
Mayama-san is coming straight to the inn, right?
We are going on a trip, but for it to be on the same day as his employment exam...
But it is surprising that lazy Mayama is willing to switch trains to come all the way out here.
He wants to follow his own agenda but hates being left out!
Mayama is basically just a child!
Tamura-sensei said that you should come get your work since he is cleaning up the photography room.
You are always putting things off until later.
Your photographs will get thrown away.
Make sure you get it later.
Do not say I did not warn you.
From the looks of it, he will not be coming back today.
Do you know where Mayama is going, Morita-san?
After all, there is only one person in this world who can make Mayama run.
All I want is for the person I like the most to like me the most.
If feels like it will never happen.
I am sorry about them being so loud.
Today is a weekday, so we do not have too many customers.
It must be tough for Daddy to handle them all alone.
They are my students at college!
Dinner is at 5:30, so can you gather everyone in the men's room?
Hanamoto-sama Morita-sama Mayama-sama Takemoto-sama ( Men's Room )
Thank goodness that this is only a replica.
But we are going to get scolded!
Maybe I can draw a replacement and put it in its place?
He drew a morotai with soy sauce?!
Morotai (dim style): a style of Japanese drawing with hazy, unclear shapes.
Will you come apologize with me if I draw one more?
Can I do it on the back of February?
How can I preserve a soy sauce picture?
Yamada-san, you have to start with He loves me not!
when doing it with a crab!
Well, I think it was okay.
Mayama-san, you have only been applying to top-notch jobs, have not you?
Why are you only applying to such seemingly impossible places?
I told him to apply to more down-to-earth places, too.
I applied to those places precisely because of this day and age.
If you are going to try and fail, you might as well do it with a high goal.
You just chose impossible places so that you could fail them all and stick around at Rika-san's...
I am going to go take another bath.
Hey, enough of those employment exams.
Let us just start a company together.
You still have the crab attached to your head!
Like I said, do not be so rowdy.
Your seat as the Vice President is already waiting!
Do not you want to be No. 2?!
It does not make me happy at all to be No. 2 in a company of two!
Why do not we take another bath before we go to bed?
The outdoor bath was really nice.
Oh, it seems I caught a cold at the exam site.
I will be better if I lie down for a bit.
It is open until 1 AM, so you can just go later.
Hanamoto-sama Morita-sama Mayama-sama Takemoto-sama ( Men's Room )
What in the world am I doing?
My after-bath snack is always fruity milk and ice cream.
Is it really okay for you to buy me all this?
Morita-san, Mayama-san, Hagu-chan will not stop crying!
Hagu sure is cute, even when she is crying.
I kind of remember seeing something like this before.
Um... well, you will also be like that when you grow up.
Why are you also crying, Morita-san?!
Make sure you put on your blanket.
I guess the men are all that are left.
We can just leave them on the floor.
Aside from that, how are you feeling?
You have not taken a bath yet, have you?
So you are getting a job, are not you?
Make sure you decide on your own.
Decide where you want to work on your own.
For my last memory as a student to be in a bath alone with my professor from school...
What do you think about that?
Do not talk about things like that, Mayama.
You are just making the situation more pathetic.
I rub my heavy eyelids to reveal
A future in the shape of pastels
As my expressions were pulled in closer
Say, what was it that we were looking for again?
That is right, exactly when were those days
bokura ga inryoku ni sakarai nagara deatta koro
When we used to meet, denying the attraction that was forming between us?
sore ga waltz no you dane fushigi sa
It is like a waltz, is not it?
sasayaku youna komorebi no kousaten de
futari waltz no youni ne mawari nagara
Where the whispering sunlight falls through the trees and meet.
Next episode: The past, tears, and a confession.
